message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product that's been thoroughly tested and refined. It's a great chance to get a feel for what we have to offer. I'm willing to let it go for $10000, a steal considering the potential benefits. What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  This sounds like a good chance to see the quality of your products. I'll take it!

I'm glad you're interested in our products! Since you've already had a positive experience with the previous one, I think you'll be blown away by the quality of this one. It's one of our top-of-the-line models, and I'm confident you'll find it exceeds your expectations. The price remains the same at $10000, but I think you'll find it's a worthwhile investment. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm hesitant after the previous product.  I need more information on this product's quality before I can commit to another purchase.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'd like to assure you that this product has undergone rigorous testing and has received exceptional feedback from our satisfied customers. In fact, I can offer you a special guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll personally work with you to resolve any issues or provide a full refund. The price remains the same at $10000, but I believe the value and quality of this product make it a worthwhile investment. What do you think?
Alice, your guarantee is convincing. I'm willing to take a chance on this one.  I'll buy it.

I'm glad you're willing to give us another chance, Bob! This product is actually a special edition model that's been designed with a unique feature that sets it apart from our standard offerings. The price remains the same at $10000. What do you think?

Alice, providing references and technical specifications is a great step. I'm willing to give this product a try, especially with the additional information available. I'll buy it.
